content.rendered:
GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Gurus

GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Gurus Project ♦ GEOKC Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji) ♦ GEOKC Head Gurus ♦ GEOKC Head Gurus Specials ♦ GEOKC Gurus

GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Gurus Project

(GEOKC Gurus Project is a gurus inheritance project)

Dedication of Gurus to Lila Avatar Lord Shri Krishna

The journey of these Bhakti Yoga Gurus begins from Mathura and Vrindavan (India) to come to the USA, and then all around the world, for the purpose of providing a specific path of Bhakti to all of our participants.

Minnesota as a First Branch of GEOKC: After the expiration of the first Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji) his teaching will automatically will be inherit to next new Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji) of MN branch which will be selected only by first Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji). This process will be constantly on for the purpose of next generation to next generation.

Other Gurus will work only under the guidance of first Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji) to call by their titles of GEOKC Head Gurus, GEOKC Head Gurus Specials, and GEOKC Gurus. After the expiration of these GEOKC Head Gurus and GEOKC Gurus, their teaching will automatically will be inherited to next new GEOKC Head Gurus and GEOKC Gurus which will be selected only by GEOKC Head Gurus and GEOKC Gurus to call with the same titles of GEOKC Head Gurus and GEOKC Gurus. This process will be constantly on for the purpose of next generation to next generation.

All Other International Branches of GEOKC: Other international branches of GEOKC will follow the same process as the first branch of GEOKC which is established in Minnesota for the purpose of to keep GEOKC active all around the world with the memory of these GEOKC Bhakti Yoga Gurus.

GEOKC Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji)

Program Areas to Serve:

Satsang Services

GEOKC Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group

Initiation

GEOKC Head Gurus

Program Areas to Serve:

Bhakti Sadhana

Services of yoga Center (Initiation only done by Pujya Guruji)

Ashram Spiritual Guidance

GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment

Spiritual Discourses

Services of Padasevana

Services of Dasya

Program of Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu

Shop for Lord Krishna

GEOKC Head Gurus Specials

GEOKC Head Gurus Specials includes 2 specific responsibilities, which are as follows:

HR Spiritual Staff

Radhakrishna Temple Priests

For more information on these roles, please see the Gurus and Staff page.

GEOKC Gurus

The following programs are practiced under the guidance of GEOKC Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji).

Program Areas to Serve:

GEOKC Traditional Bhajans

GEOKC Kirtan Heritage
